vote.text: Amendment SA 2717 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2717 proposed by Senator Braun for Senator Cortez Masto. (consideration: CR S7643; text: CR S7643) To improve the bill.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2717 proposed by Senator Braun for Senator Cortez Masto.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2717 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
